titles.title: Calling on Congress to condemn voter suppression laws enacted by States and political subdivisions.
Calling on Congress to condemn voter suppression laws enacted by States and political subdivisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the use by states and political subdivisions of specified voter suppression laws and techniques.
